text:
Thank you Sin Yan from Hafary for your amazing service during my home renovation! She was incredibly patient and helpful throughout the whole tile selection process. Whenever I couldn’t decide on the right design, she always offered honest and thoughtful suggestions that really made a difference.

Her friendly attitude and professionalism made the experience smooth and enjoyable. I truly appreciate her support and would highly recommend Sin Yan to anyone looking for quality tiles and great service!

I had a great experience with Crystal for my tile purchase. Her service was excellent from start to finish — professional, friendly, and very easy to communicate with. She provided helpful advice on tile selection and arranged the delivery efficiently. What really stood out was her after-sales service — fast response and genuine support. Highly recommended!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Exceptional Service from Brenda at Hafary!**

I recently had the pleasure of working with Brenda at Hafary for my wall tile selection, and I couldn’t be happier with the experience! Brenda was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and attentive to my needs. She took the time to understand my design preferences and offered excellent recommendations that perfectly matched my vision.

Her professionalism, friendly demeanor, and willingness to go the extra mile made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. Brenda’s expertise in tiles and her ability to provide practical yet stylish solutions truly set her apart. Thanks to her, my renovation project turned out better than I imagined!

I highly recommend Brenda to anyone looking for top-notch service and quality tiles. Hafary is lucky to have such a dedicated and talented salesperson. Will definitely return for future projects!

I had an amazing experience thanks to Hana! She was incredibly helpful, professional, and went above and beyond to ensure everything was taken care of. Her positive attitude and attention to detail made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend Hana for her exceptional service!

I was really impressed with the incredible variety of tiles at Hafary! They have everything from classic to modern designs, with options that fit any style or budget. The quality of the tiles is top-notch, and I found exactly what I was looking for. Hana was also super helpful in guiding me through my choices.

Angel provided excellent support when my tile order faced shipping delays. She proactively updated me and offered an alternative to keep my renovation on track. Highly recommend her for her responsiveness and problem solving thank you angel!
